title: Oh I love the new Mordekaiser
body:
He starts with so much dmg and base armor...   His base movement speed too... such a fair champ.

His ultimate is awesome too... I can separate out somebody from a teamfight where his teammates cant help... all while stealing a portion of his AD and AP while I engage in a single 1v1.

Such a great addition to the game.  Riot's balance team really hit the nail on the head with this champ... they did such a great job playtesting objectively... we didn't see a single time where the team with morde was defeated but hey its because the other team was always trash...

He pretty much has bonus MS permanently on with his passive while in combat with a champion so maybe that made OP think his actual MS was that huge. 

Morde is bonkers strong, but he kind of should be until people (myself, included. went 1/8 or so last game I had with a Morde in it, and yes he singled me out (me jungle, him top) in every fight I saw him and just couldn't die.) get better at counterplaying him. 
Juggernauts are pub stompers, and 98% of the player base are primed for getting stomped but id wager his skill floor aside from R is super low. 
Translation for clarity: It takes very, very low effort and knowledge to perform reasonably well on Mordekaiser. 
If he was say, 51% WR in a vacuum and 25 people played 2 games with him each, they could reasonably expect to win ~24-27 out of the 50 games, despite having only 1 prior game played at best.

Thank you for actually adding info to the conversation.  So many idiotic trolls around here.

I've been told QSS counters the ult.  Do we have any other counters that level the playing field?

A list of everything that counters Realm of Death:

Cleansing effects as follows:
-Mikael's Crucible from an ally during the cast time
-QSS during cast time or during the ultimate
-all self-cleansing abilities, think Gangplank W, empowered Rengar W, Olaf R, Alistar R

Becoming untargetable during the cast time:
-Fizz E
-an ally pulled by Kalista or eaten by Tahm Kench
-Camille R
-Rek'Sai R

Being unstoppable during cast time:
-Sion R
-Malphite R
-Illaoi R

Mordekaiser losing vision of his target during cast time:
-all champions becoming Invisible
-all champions becoming camouflaged outside their vision radius
-Akali W
-stepping into a bush that Mordekaiser has no vision of

Using hard CC on Mordekaiser during the cast time

Also, while within the Death Realm, depending on the area, you can kite him around walls since Mordekaiser has no mobility outside of walking faster.

> [{quoted}](name=funkdubious2,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JPY6wBEp,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-06-13T05:31:23.067+0000)
>

> 
> I've been told QSS counters the ult.  Do we have any other counters that level the playing field?

Anyone who can dash over a wall, as there is almost a guarantee to be one. Morde cannot jump these walls, though his Q can hit you from over most of them and proper E usage makes the Q easier to hit. 

Shaco is a risky Morde Ult target because it goes on cooldown ... wirthout doing anything if he Rs the clone. 

Malzahar, however, is NOT. 
**DO NOT** pick Malzahar into Mordekaiser. 
Riot put a 0.5 second slow on the R, which dispels Malz' passive. And THEN the pull into the other dimension happens after that 0.5 seconds. This means your passive will never actually block the R. Not sure what happens to existing Voidlings, if Yi R counters the Morde ult by preventing the slow (probably not. Also, going untargetable due to Alpha will just fizzle the CD and he'll ult you after anyway.) 

Of course, any long-duration CC or Stasis will help even the odds in your favor a LOT, as Morde does not have a whole lot of upfront burst so cutting his 7 second window down as much as possible will at the very least mean he doesn't keep your stats after you die to him anyway. 

There's weird interactions between Akali's E, pets, and Vi R that I dont completely understand yet. 
If only Riot would update Sandbox mode to include multiple playable champions on either side so I can do things like Ult a target behind an Enemy morde whos ulting one of my allies etc. without having to have friends coordinate this with me. Not everyone is Vandiril
